T02nagbhc_u:4: kuṇapaḥ kāminī bhakṣya iti tisro vikalpanāḥ || NagBhc_20
T02nagbhc_u:7: cittamātram idaṃ sarvam iti yā deśanā muneḥ |
T02nagbhc_u:10: yatra boddhā ca bodhyaṃ ca tatra bodhir na vidyate || NagBhc_45
T02nagbhc_u:12: ākāśaṃ bodhicittaṃ ca bodhir advayalakṣaṇā || NagBhc_46
T02nagbhc_u:14: guḍe madhuratā cāgner uṣṇatvaṃ prakṛtir yathā |
T02nagbhc_u:15: śūnyatā sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathā prakṛtir iṣyate || NagBhc_57
T02nagbhc_u:17: bhidyante bahudhā loka upāyair bahubhiḥ punaḥ || NagBhc_98
